name: OR_CASE_IB_HIST
description: The OR_CASE_IB_HIST table contains OR management system case In Basket history.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the In Basket history for the case.

columns.name: IB_HIST_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the type of action the message serves to notify.

columns.name: IB_HIST_SENDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who sent the message.

columns.name: IB_HIST_SENDER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: IB_HIST_RECP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is the first recipient of the message.

columns.name: IB_HIST_RECP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: IB_HIST_DATE
columns.description: The date and time the message was sent.

columns.name: IB_HIST_SUBJECT
columns.description: The subject line of the message.

columns.name: IB_HIST_BODY_LINE
columns.description: The line number where the message body begins in the case record.

columns.name: IB_HIST_BODY_LEN
columns.description: The length of the message body in the case record.

columns.name: IB_HIST_RECIP_INI
columns.description: The database initials of the recipient registry in the message.

columns.name: IB_HIST_MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The message ID of the message.
